10.23.17  10:25 am   Was shakespeare using the language at the time to construct his plays? Or I thought he literally constructed some of his own words?

     i think he used the language of the day. but also was not afraid to have a good time

10.23.17  10:19 am   what can i do to make you make longer videos

     well, you'd have to be willing to wait for the time it takes for me to make it. for example, i could be making a 'longer video' right now, and yet you have still assumed i am not. why would this be

     perhaps not high enough

     you could take a boat

     no

Perhaps.....on Tuesday?

     it's a different time, and now there are many other different interesting things to be a star of

     not just

     yes

10.23.17  12:01 am   What's the name of the series of notes that churches and clocks chime at the top of each hour? Mine go A C# B E - E B C# A - C# A B E - E B C# A. I hear it all the time but don't know what it's called. Almost every old church does it.

      westminster quarters

10.23.17  12:01 am   what is your gender?

     i am holding a competition for people to guess

     do you even have one?

     i will check

10.22.17  11:05 pm   was the ask button always in capital letters?

     yes

     is this the mandela effect?

     it was his idea

10.22.17  9:43 pm   How Do I become the president?

     i was going to give specific instructions, but it's actually looking like there are more innovative ways than i thought

10.22.17  9:30 pm   did you create spotify for good or for evil

     i did not create spotify but it was created for evil. no offense spotify if you are reading this

10.22.17  9:03 pm   If im getting blisters on my fingers from drumming does that mean I'm holding my sticks wrong or does it just mean I have to drum more?

     no, it just means you haven't played that much in a while. first day back after not playing for a while, just wear some bandaids on those spots. after a few days your skin will toughen up just fine and you won't need the bandaids. it's the same thing that happens to your fingertips when playing guitar/bass.

10.22.17  8:44 pm   Do you think people can be wrong. I think people can only be misguided but perhaps I am just misguided.

      let's at least wait until a situation arises before predicting whether they can be right or wrong. maybe even wait longer, whilst attempting to understand

10.22.17  8:05 pm   Will you keep doing songs like Outside?

     yes, and also slightly different

10.22.17  7:32 pm   if u could chose a ueqstion, what would it be and what would ur answer be

     wait let me get this straight, i built this entire page so you could ask questions, and i answer all the questions, now you want me to ask them too

10.22.17  7:00 pm   Hey, just a heads up... i was reading through the random questions and there's a question from 3.21.16Â  12:01 pmÂ Â "what are we" and your response is "by that point, i was well into emergency "crunch time" mode, trying to finish vines as fast as humanly possible in order to make time to work on an extremely long video i was trying to get started. ideally for that vine i would have found a broad range of different movies, but instead i just grabbed them all from the same page, literally the first page i found with a lot of movie images. as a result, i think they are all 2013 movies"... I'm guessing something happened where the answer was mismatched with the question or something? Sorry if you don't like people pointing out this kind of stuff. I'm not trying to be a smart-ass or anything like that. I don't know if you care to go back and fix little stuff like this. 

     thank you. fixed it. here it is in case you are curious about what the question actually was

10.22.17  6:51 pm   Have you ever tried to get your music on the radio? I don't really know how that stuff works. Do artists have to pay the station to play their music, or does the station have to pay the artist to be able to play their music?

     i'm actually using the same strategy as i used for videos, starting in 2014. i'm not sure if that puts things into perspective. the strategy i think is rock solid but it might take a while

     hahahahahaha sure no problem

10.22.17  3:21 am   if I'm focusing on getting good enough at my instrument to be a professional musician, how many songs should I do transcriptions of in a month in order to keep up? also, how many songs should I write in a month to get good at writing?

     it depends how good you want to get. but try to jump on gigs as soon as you can because the gigs will make you better faster than almost anything else you can do alone in your home
